full_description:
Xiaomi RedmiBook 15 Core i3 11th Gen 15.6" FHD Laptop

Xiaomi RedmiBook 15 Core i3 11th Gen 15.6" FHD Laptop comes with 11th Gen Intel Core i3-1115G4 processor which has a 4.1GHz maximum clock speed and Intel UHD Graphics. The display is a 15.6 inches or 39.6cm Full HD display. The supported resolution is 1920 x 1080 pixels. For Memory, it has an 8GB DDR4 3200MHz RAM and a 256GB PCIe NVMe SSD. Connectivity options include 2 X 2 Dual-Band Wi-Fi 5 and Bluetooth V5.0. The I/O ports include one USB 2.0, two USB 3.2 Gen 1, one HDMI 1.4, one RJ45 LAN port, one 3.5mm audio jack, one Kensington Lock port, and one SD card reader. The keyboard is a Scissor Mechanism 1.5mm key travel laptop keyboard. The touchpad has Multi-touch support for Windows Precision drivers. The Webcam is 720p HD. This laptop has 2 x 2W Stereo Speakers with support for DTS audio processing app, a 3.5mm combo jack, and an In-built microphone. the battery backup is around 10-Hour and the capacity is 46WHr. The Power Adapter is 65Watt. The used material is Polycarbonate with a brushed metallic finish. The dimension of this laptop is 19.9 x 363.8 x 243.5 mm. the Weight of this laptop is 1.8 kg. Xiaomi RedmiBook 15 Core i3 11th Gen 15.6" FHD Laptop offers 01 Year Warranty.

The I/O ports include one USB 2.0, two USB 3.2 Gen 1, one HDMI 1.4, one RJ45 LAN port, one 3.5mm audio jack, and an In-built microphone. The keyboard is a Scissor Mechanism 1.5mm key travel laptop keyboard. The touchpad has Multi-touch support for Windows Precision drivers. The Webcam is 720p HD. full_description:
Xiaomi RedmiBook Pro 14 Ryzen 5 5500U 14" Laptop

The Xiaomi RedmiBook Pro 14 comes with AMD Ryzen 5 5500U Processor (8M Cache, 2.1GHz up to 4.0GHz, 6 cores) and 16 GB DDR4 3200MHz RAM. It comes with a 512 GB PCIe SSD. This laptop has been integrated with AMD Radeon Graphics and has a 14 Inch (2560x1600) FHD, 178°, 300nits, 16:10, 100% sRGB display. It also has a full-size backlit keyboard, 1.3mm key travel, 125mm x 81.6mm, PTP trackpad. Xiaomi RedmiBook Pro 14 runs on Windows 10 Home operating system. It is powered by a 56Whr Non-Removable Lithium-ion battery and comes with a Type-C Adapter, 65W,100-240V. This laptop features Built-in AKG Speaker and microphone. It also has an HD Webcam. The RedmiBook Pro 14 is equipped with WiFi 6, support 2.4Ghz and 5GHz; 802.11 AX, compatible with 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac; and Bluetooth 5.1 for network & wireless connectivity. The laptop is designed with 1 x USB-C for charging and data transmission, Thunderbolt 4 x 1, USB 2.0 x 1, USB 3.2 Gen1 x 1, HDMI x 1ext. display at 60Hz, 1080p display up to 240Hz), 1 x USB-C, 1 x USB-A 3.2 Gen1, 1 x USB-A 2.0, 1 x 3.5mm audio jack. It supports 3-screen display and dual 4K video playback: support 2 external 4K-resolution devices with full HD display, three screens display different contents. The Xiaomi RedmiBook Pro 14 laptop comes with a 1-year warranty.

values.value: 1 x USB -C slot,Support charging, data transfer

RAM: 16 GB DDR4, Storage: 512 GB NVMe SSD
full_description:
Xiaomi Mi NoteBook Ultra Core i7 11th Gen 15.6" 3.2K Display Laptop

The Xiaomi Mi NoteBook Ultra Laptop is a powerful laptop that introduces a slew of new capabilities to the thin and light work category. It's ideal for power users or anybody looking to increase their productivity while still creating and consuming content. This notebook will be a capable companion whether you are programming, editing images or videos, crunching numbers, or simply playing casual games. To deliver scorching fast performance, the laptop combines strong hardware with even more competent software. It boasts a 3.2K Mi TrueLife+ Display - Large Anti-glare Display 39.62 cm (15.6), 100% sRGB, 16:10 Aspect ratio, and 242 PPI. This laptop offers a smooth refresh rate of 90Hz. It has a powerful 11th Generation Intel Core i7-11370H processor. Iris Xe Graphics goes toe-to-toe with discrete mobile GPUs. This model has quick transfer rates, boot-up and wake-up times, and up to 16GB, 3200 MHz DDR4 RAM for seamless multitasking and smooth performance. Backlit tactile keyboard for a stress-free typing experience. Its Multi-touch Trackpad allows you to simply swipe, scroll, and select. Thunderbolt 4, USB Type-C, HDMI 1.4, USB 3.2, and a 3.5mm combination audio port are all available on this laptop. The Xiaomi NoteBook Ultra has a 01-year warranty.

values.value: Multi-touch with support for Windows Precision drivers
Support for DTS audio processing app
1 x Type-C USB (For charging and data transfer)
Built into the power button with support for Windows Hello
65W Type-C power adapter (compatible across USB Type-C and Thunderbolt 4 ports)
